definition: to keep/to contain/to suck (keep in your mouth without chewing)
to mix/to mingle/muddled/to drift along/to muddle along/to pass for/to get along with sb/thoughtless/reckless

sentences.english: The powers of this new post are exceedingly vague.
sentences.chinese: 這個新職位的權力範圍及其含混。

sentences.english: The molding of love in The Peony Pavilion is ambiguous.
sentences.chinese: 而《牡丹亭》對情的塑形是含混的。

sentences.english: Deliberately obfuscated source code is not allowed.
sentences.chinese: 故意地使源代碼變得含混晦澀是不允許的。

sentences.english: When the government policies are expressed imprecisely, confusion results.
sentences.chinese: 政府政策的措辭含混不清就會產生混亂。

sentences.english: Don't be so wishy-washy. Tell us how you really feel.
sentences.chinese: 別這麼含含混糊的，告訴我們你的實在感觸吧。

sentences.english: The person might take too long to provide an answer or get words mixed up.
sentences.chinese: 這個人可能會很久纔給出回答或者說的詞句含混不清。

sentences.english: In the latest video-in-video ads, the content and the ads are mixed.
sentences.chinese: 然而在視頻廣告中，廣告與視頻內容是含混不清的。

sentences.english: This ambiguity was caused by the confusion of axiology in tin, late Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 這種含混是因爲晚明價值論的混亂造成的。

sentences.english: I was totally mixed up by his elusive and ambiguous remarks.
sentences.chinese: 我完全被他摸棱兩可，含混不清的話搞糊塗了。

sentences.english: Be specific, not vague or fuzzy.
sentences.chinese: 職業表述要精確，不可含混模糊。

sentences.english: As a candidate, he was criticized for sending mixed messages.
sentences.chinese: 在競選總統時，他被批評發出含混不清的信息。

sentences.english: The item he intentionally obscured would make several interpretations possible.
sentences.chinese: 他故意搞得含混不清的條款，可能會做出好幾種解釋。

sentences.english: The international rulebook is fuzzy on this issue.
sentences.chinese: 我們的國際規則手冊在這個問題上含混不清。

definition: to mention sth without elaborating (idiom); not giving details
apparently right but actually wrong; specious (idiom)
to avoid the important and dwell on the trivial/to keep silent about major charges while admitting minor ones
to talk in one's sleep/crazy talk
talking in one's sleep/delirious ravings/nonsense/sheer fantasy
